result.eng: I saw her coming towards me across the street.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráide
result.orig: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráide
result.html: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráideI saw her coming towards me across the street.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í agus í ag teaċt ċugam trasna na sráideI saw her coming towards me across the street.

result.eng: The colour is shading towards red.
result.ga: Tá an dath ag dul i leith an deirg
result.orig: Tá an dath ag dul i leith an deirg
result.html: Tá an dath ag dul i leith an deirgThe colour is shading towards red.
result.ponchtml: Tá an daṫ ag dul i leiṫ an deirgThe colour is shading towards red.

result.eng: They were walking towards each other.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag siúl i dtreo a chéile
result.orig: Bhí siad ag siúl i dtreo a chéile
result.html: Bhí siad ag siúl i dtreo a chéileThey were walking towards each other.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag siúl i dtreo a ċéileThey were walking towards each other.

result.eng: He pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
result.ga: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
result.orig: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
result.html: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís íHe pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarraing sé air leaḃar scríoḃ dornán inti agus ḋruid arís íHe pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.

result.eng: The master pulled towards himself the big book.
result.ga: Tharraing an máistir air an leabhar mór
result.orig: Tharraing an máistir air an leabhar mór
result.html: Tharraing an máistir air an leabhar mórThe master pulled towards himself the big book.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarraing an máistir air an leaḃar mórThe master pulled towards himself the big book.
